name: Fear Of The Unknown (itch) (Gerardo Rodriguez)
description:
The door opened automatically, the silence was strange since scientists used to walk in a hurry busy with their experiments. I remember that they used to stumble and fall to the ground because of their desperation. My job on the US Titan was simple, keep order.

A few days before arriving at our destination they put me in assisted hibernation, the Mandela space station, to which we were going to supply it with provisions, medicines and a cargo that only scientists knew about.

Upon awakening, the ship was in complete solitude, with no clues as to what had happened.

Fear Of The Unknown is a first-person horror game set in outer space, our objective will be to investigate and escape from the ship and the creatures that inhabit it.

PostProcessing = Off
